tool_description: Endpoints to get price and meta data for Alibaba, Aliexpress, Amazon, Asos, farfetch, Fashion Nova, H&M, Jiji, Jumia, Konga, Pakcosmetics, Polly, shein, Superdrugs, Zara
name: salesngine
title: salesngine

api_list.name: HM
api_list.description: Endpoint for getting product price and meta data of a product on H&M
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://salesngine2.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1.0/site/hm"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "salesngine2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
